data.text: RT @DelishDirection: Looking for summer flight deals to Europe? Here's why I reco @AirFranceIN https://t.co/ypoFPwqfTM #franceisintheair #b…
@DelishDirection @DelishDirection Dear Prachi, thanks much for a lovely blog. Its great to read ur experience and that you had a nice time :) @landais_cedric
Take a break on the island of Santorini and prepare to relax to the fullest. Book Now:  https://t.co/EKGxO4h2iy https://t.co/r7ynVLDlpl
@forsytheJR Hello there, we regret the inconvenience caused. To be able to check further, could you please share/ DM your booking reference. Regards
@PoojaShah30 Hello, We are sorry to learn of your baggage incident. Trust our customer care team member already contacted you. Regards
@karanBhojwani Hello, for visa related queries, you are requested to kindly contact the respective Consulate/Embassy. regards
@lalituor Hello Sir, the usual arrival terminal for AF191 is 2E. You can also find this info on our website link https://t.co/DN9sRB5vmI Regards
@chandrika_4 @airfrance Hello Chandrika. Request please provide your file reference number. Thanks
@myscribblings Super! We are happy to know that you are happy :)
@ramyavellanki Awesome! Thx as well :)
@sanchitabhartiy Merci Sanchita. We are glad that you liked them :)
@sonaljain2190, @ramyavellanki, @myscribblings  @sanchitabhartiy and @prachimana (1/2) pls DM us your complete address and phone. Cheers!
@sonaljain2190, @ramyavellanki, @myscribblings  @sanchitabhartiy and @prachimana (1/2) (please DM us your complete address and phone) Cheers
Hey Ladies, Thanks for participation! The lucky winners for our #FlyWithYourBesties #WomensDayContest are (1/1)
@Sage_ness The local acquiring bank has assured us that the duplicate amounts have been re credited . Kindly check and confirm. Regards,
@Sage_ness Hello! as per our records the refund has been processed in Jan'17 in accordance to the fare conditions. Regards
@rohan_dfg @airfrance  We replied to you via DM. Please visit our website https://t.co/HySx21ajLX for all related updates. Regards
May You celebrate the gleeful moments of life with flying colours. Play safe and celebrate the love for colours. #happyholi2017 https://t.co/UyyGZuhAPX
@betito_ibarra Hello Sir, you could contact our India call centre at toll free 1800-1800-033 (9am-6pm, Mon-Sat) & they will assist you. Rgds
Sharing the moments as we celebrated #WomensDay with our female passengers before take off for the 08 March flight from India :) https://t.co/5bBTkvok2f
Hurray Ladies! Have you yet imagined what 'your kind of' girls trip to Europe would be like? #FlyWithYourBesties #WomensDayContest https://t.co/PiRC6EgbOu
@vishalg4u Thank you Sir for choosing Air France. We are glad that our Colleague Kanika was able to help you. Best Regards
Tell us about a #DreamTrip you would like to take to #Europe with your #Besties and why? #FlyWithYourBesties #WomensDayContest (1/3)
5 lucky ones will stand a chance to win exciting goodies! (1/2)
Calling Ladies! Participate in our #FlyWithYourBesties #WomensDayContest open on 07-08 March only. (1/1) https://t.co/u3CsYn0CrE
@vishalg4u Hello Vishal, one of our colleagues will contact you shortly today. Regards
@anjuscor Hello Geetha, like we replied earlier, kindly share your contact number via DM and one of our agent will call you. Thanks
@DelishDirection @visitportugal Wish you a pleasant flight experience with @airfrance
@anjuscor Hello Ma'am, looks like there is a bug! Could you DM us your contact number so we can arrange a call for you. Regards
@AkashK95 , @reenajain89 and @rvirgo9 : please DM us your address and contact details :)
